members.member:
Add a new lift
Name of the new lift Is the new lift currently working or not The amount of seats in the new lift The time the new lift needs to lift from the beginning to the end The added lift with assigned ID The added lift with assigned ID A lift with such name already exists /// Note that the names of lifts should be unique.
